nodes.text: The Great Journey was a trip under taken by all members of the Je'daii Order as Je'daii Journeyers. The Journey involved traveling to each of the nine Je'daii Temples on Tython by foot, animal or machine. The Great Journey had to be complete before a Je'daii (Jedi) Journeyer could become a Je'daii Ranger. Journeyers were permitted to travel alone or in small groups to the Temples, and was known to take months or years to complete.
